properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) "COUNT" FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_TYPE = 1

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS "RNUM", A.* FROM ( SELECT BOARD_NO , BOARD_TITLE , COUNT , NICKNAME , CATEGORY_NAME , TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD') AS "CREATE_DATE" FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER ON (BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO) JOIN CATEGORY USING (CATEGORY_NO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_TYPE = 1 ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
